item.title: Quantum Physics - Infinite Well 1d
item.description: Lately I have had some extra quiet time due to medical conditions, and I took on some quantum mechanics. I followed the MIT 8.04 course on OCW, but I’m also following the great ‘Introduction to Quantum Mechanics’ book by David Griffiths and Darrell Schroeter. That made me rediscover my local library, and also too ‘Numerical Methods in Physycs with Python’ by Alex Gerzerlis and that combination gives this series of articles on both, python and physics with some summaries, exercises and musings on the subject.
